entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
